p: A total of 2,789 studies were retrieved from 4 databases and hand searched. The duplicate records were removed (n = 1180), and the eligibility criteria were applied for the selection process. After reviewing the full text, 76 articles were excluded for the following reasons: irrelevant for the research topic (n = 38) and population (n = 4), unavailable full-text (n = 32), review article (n = 1), and duplicated report (n = 1). Finally, 37 articles were included in this review ( Fig 1).
